body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Stephen Gray and the customer's name is Abigail Long.  The conversation is about Accounting Eagles (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, and thank you for contacting Accounting Eagles! My name is Stephen Gray. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Stephen, my name is Abigail Long. I'm a bit confused about my latest bill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Abigail. Can you please provide me with your account number so I can look up your details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is two five eight seven four one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Could you also confirm your date of birth, please? This is just for security purposes.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my date of birth is September fifteenth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Abigail. Let me take a moment to review your bill and see what the confusion might be.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That would be great, I really appreciate it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see here that there was a misunderstanding regarding a charge for extra services. I can help clarify that for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Oh, that makes sense. Thank you for your help, Stephen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Abigail! Thank you for your time today. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out to us again.
